mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_name, user_nickname, user_password, user_gender, user_age, user_phone, user_address, user_portrait, user_permissions, user_duedate, children_birthday, mother_name, mother_age, program_code, user_grade, user_upline) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userGender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPermissions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userDuedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{childrenBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{motherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{motherAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{programCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userGrade,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userUpline,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_nickname = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_gender = #{userGender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_age = #{userAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_portrait = #{userPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_permissions = #{userPermissions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_duedate = #{userDuedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, children_birthday = #{childrenBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mother_name = #{motherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mother_age = #{motherAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, program_code = #{programCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_grade = #{userGrade,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_upline = #{userUpline,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_nickname, user_password, user_gender, user_age, user_phone, user_address, user_portrait, user_permissions, user_duedate, children_birthday, mother_name, mother_age, program_code, user_grade, user_upline from user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select user_id, user_name, user_nickname, user_password, user_gender, user_age, user_phone, user_address, user_portrait, user_permissions, user_duedate, children_birthday, mother_name, mother_age, program_code, user_grade, user_upline from user
